Posts.EditableText:
Is it too much too ask, if it doesn't already exist somewhere, to have someone compile a list a common text processor commands that are useful and often used?  I've never used them and it sounds like they could be very helpful.  I would love to add it to my helpful threads list - http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/5835/my-most-helpful-threads

Just throwing that out there in case someone wants the job.  I pay in hefty compliments!

XanMag
